title: Understanding Individualism
text: Individualism is a social theory that emphasizes the moral worth of the individual. It promotes the idea that individuals should be independent and self-reliant.

title: Characteristics of Individualistic Cultures
text: In individualistic cultures, people are encouraged to make choices for their own benefit. There is a strong emphasis on personal responsibility, especially in areas like health care.

title: Examples of Individualistic Cultures
text: Countries like the United States, United Kingdom, and other parts of Western Europe are often considered individualistic. These cultures value independence and self-reliance.
